lines.text: [Jack comes home from a business trip to find his ex-fiance, Kristy Taylor, hosting prostitutes and their clients in the house Jack "legally" stole from Kristy]
I didn't have anything to do with this!
Excuse me! I represent Ms. Taylor, and I can assure you that Mr. Jack Wyler is the sole owner of this house.
Well, just what kind of a house are you running here, Mr. Wyler?
I think that should be fairly clear, Detective.
It's just a wedding - this is business.
It's our wedding! It's not a corporate cocktail party!
